Two users reused a prime when generating their RSA keys, making both public. Can you recover the secret message? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 36373509744576275772707022992604201602007286212025985712483054591591195056398912505299429976839637615750077536831609172001873381354662500715457997819401971399290020997507898670327759779458510923142067355810019731219795862803616218, ciphertext2: 259648862759915548010352812386330552017864734131855256137053659306374022563030923624775245912266241220057780148769640740944691920614463152807934048342469563047948466011841934591432261751193018549488319206609516798597618812213927439

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=567766937898480499377388176040427065677319931679322912155532736500964033638985231624099310790798924017004785975860338762319069916138302949218449034234081973815622387676035449131479853775461434100604440458453118818582376787723921701, n2=691115753537240994274977663484900269278994395724614009006402231788848880831825526806770107269765223963423261106583714383803568628374804677215973226589601357265374374792400560518902778493839589800190039349636930983174756691567426357, e=478971369930084701353495443100704440411782150868299758752433099308814975819877892034898396172237727895287803204138891691230328272970070463862057443632106899880409208782624448521758143614353913673488885950630559834126261165240146725

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{8zaqosm3}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 36373509744576275772707022992604201602007286212025985712483054591591195056398912505299429976839637615750077536831609172001873381354662500715457997819401971399290020997507898670327759779458510923142067355810019731219795862803616218, ciphertext2: 259648862759915548010352812386330552017864734131855256137053659306374022563030923624775245912266241220057780148769640740944691920614463152807934048342469563047948466011841934591432261751193018549488319206609516798597618812213927439
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=567766937898480499377388176040427065677319931679322912155532736500964033638985231624099310790798924017004785975860338762319069916138302949218449034234081973815622387676035449131479853775461434100604440458453118818582376787723921701, n2=691115753537240994274977663484900269278994395724614009006402231788848880831825526806770107269765223963423261106583714383803568628374804677215973226589601357265374374792400560518902778493839589800190039349636930983174756691567426357, e=478971369930084701353495443100704440411782150868299758752433099308814975819877892034898396172237727895287803204138891691230328272970070463862057443632106899880409208782624448521758143614353913673488885950630559834126261165240146725
extra_info: p=25892706047968059154556747696267518210972583543955561400812842588414354605956365102102438011852190698247630542771667, q=21927678661575669696972372087705487231453979330502679199437567367129848920287466558923560041801849510960139655320103, r=31517962489494959420842249363508137837451804228205730078560011688010100335079930912438180737290120665632029694954819, φ(n1)=567766937898480499377388176040427065677319931679322912155532736500964033638985231624099310790798924017004785975860290941934360372409451420098665061228639547252747929435435198721524309571935190268943414460399464778373169017525829932, φ(n2)=691115753537240994274977663484900269278994395724614009006402231788848880831825526806770107269765223963423261106583660938162417557745686862594522012964532451481815666383122562939847638544584222402718677608857839012998164522217151436
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
